actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 98-1150.
Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution providing for a motion to take the bill (H.R. 999) to provide for the conservation, rehabilitation, and improvement of natural and cultural resources located on public or Indian lands, and for other purposes, from the Speaker's table and to agree to the Senate amendment.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 999 (American Conservation Corps) and the Senate amendment thereto.

titles.title: A resolution providing for a motion to take the bill (H.R. 999) to provide for the conservation, rehabilitation, and improvement of natural and cultural resources located on public or Indian lands, and for other purposes, from the Speaker's table and to agree to the Senate amendment.
